name: limtr-report-service
description: A Lambda function for Trusted Advisor service limit checks refresh

scripts.test: env LIMIT_REPORT_TBL='limitreport' AWS_REGION='us-east-1' SQS_URL='https://test.com' MAX_MESSAGES=2 MAX_LOOPS=2 ANONYMOUS_DATA='Yes' SOLUTION='SO005' UUID='xxxx-111' LOG_LEVEL=INFO mocha lib/*.spec.js
scripts.build-init: rm -rf dist && rm -f archive.zip && mkdir dist && mkdir dist/lib
scripts.build:copy: cp index.js dist/ && cp -r lib/*.js dist/lib
scripts.build:install: cp package.json dist/ && cd dist && npm install --production
